description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Fatphobia is not a thing because it’s not irrational to fear being fat. But the left labels people as phobic the moment their truth is not affirmed, as these people cannot accurately define words if their lives depended on it. Nonetheless, everyone should be fatphobic but one TikToker is demanding you glorify her gluttonous lifestyle or else you are sexist, racist, and probably homophobic.

Tiktoker blasts people for not being bothered enough when others are fatphobic because fatphobia is
title: Watch: Body-positive TikToker demands you denounce fatphobia or else... you're raaaaaaacist
